senses.sense_definition: A line at the beginning of a newspaper article or document that states the date and place of origin.

examples.text: The reporter checked the <w>dateline</w> to see exactly when the story was filed.
Every article from the conflict zone carried a specific <w>dateline</w>.

senses.sense_definition: To mark a document or article with a line stating the date and place of origin.

examples.text: The editor <w>datelined</w> the story from Paris before publishing it.
She <w>datelined</w> her report to ensure the timeline was clear to readers.
